page.title: 10CHILDRENS' GAMES- 1
page.content: Many of the old playground games are still used in village schools, especially as rhythm songs and chants for skipping. However it has become very noticable that the words, and in some cases the tunes, are changing as a direct result of the influence of TV commercials. The actual rhymes used in skipping and circle games vary from village to village and, indeed, from one generation of schoolchildren to the next in any particular community. Tag games are legion as they always have been. Variations of basic tag games are given separate names and in recent years tag games based on video and computer software have appeared.
